string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling sun floating over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

string.name: desc
string.value: By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel. Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the #cscroll that allows you to reset 1 AP from the ability stat#. Choose one AP from HP, MP, STR, DEX, INT, or LUK , and allocate it to the desired category. The lowest an AP level can reach on any category is 4.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st-job skill#. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 2nd-level skill#. The 1st job SP raised AFTER the 2nd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 2nd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd-level skill#. The 1st & 2nd job SP raised AFTER the 3rd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 2nd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This will enable the owner of the weapon to engrave his/her name on an equipment item once. Click on the item, and drag the item #con top of the equipment of choice# to engrave your character name on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lock that seals away any equipment items and throwing stars, excluding the quest items. By sealing the item away, the item will be #cdisabled from selling, trading, or throwing away#. Double-click on the lock to un-seal the item.

string.value: (+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll will enable you to change your character name to something totally new! Please be aware that the character must be at level 10 or higher to be eligible for the name change and the new name should be an acceptable new name that has passed the name check. The name-change will occur during the following server check, and you will then be restricted from changing names for one month.

string.name: desc
string.value: This item is used to transfer your character from one game world server to another. Your character must be at least Level 20, and only up to 1,000,000 mesos will be transferred with the character.

string.value: A potion made by Russelon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Russelon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Russelon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

string.name: desc
string.value: An ancient ring of wondrous power. There appears to be a faded inscription along the side..."Subani". Provides a boost of +8 W. Att, +15 M. Att, +12 Def/M. Def. for 8 minutes. May only be used 5 times before it vanishes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A healing tonic made with Edmund's secret recipe. Just the thing when you're feeling under the weather! [Restores 50% of HP and MP, also gives +14 W. Att + 30 M.Att, for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value:
A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.
[Restores all HP/MP, +50 Weapon Defense, +50 Magic Defense for 10 minutes. 5 uses.]

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty, hot smore. Perfect for a toasty Halloween night!
[Restores 25% HP/MP and gives a boost of +10 to Avoidability, Jump and Speed for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Just one taste of this spicy candy and it'll feel like your heart's on fire! [Gives +60 Weapon Attack, +60 Speed, +60 Avoidability for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweetened pumpkin taffy on a candy cane stick. [Gives +15 Weapon Defense, +15 Magic Defense for 5 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restore 1200HP, 1200MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is lime-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is grape-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is orange-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600HP, 600MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mouth-watering, delectable sweet treat! [Gives +100 Accuracy for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold. \n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: This delicious cranberry sauce complements almost any meal! \n[Gives + 30 Magic Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like someone dropped this potato. \n[Restores 800 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: The only thing better than a gravy boat is a gravy train. \n[Restores 800 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious looking Christmas Ham with a sprig of mistletoe on top.\nRecovers 3000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The traditional Versalmas dinner. Smells… like fish. \nRecovers 2385 HP and 3791 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cheese from the alternate dimension of Versal. Looks funny but smells quite nice. \nGives +220 Magic Attack for 2 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: Olives frosted with pink sugar -- a special treat beloved by children from Versal! \nGives +40 Speed and + 25 Jump for 5 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: O-Pongo's favorite treat! Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center! \nRestores 800 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme. \nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: SPF 1000. Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones. \nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed. [Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: John Barricade’s special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams. For use in emergencies! [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dark Kerning City.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.\nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that returns you to Ludibrium.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warp powder made by fairy Phylia. Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.

string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious elixir made by Moira which enables anyone that drinks this potion to temporarily transform into a dragon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret medicine that allows you to transform into Tigun, the patrol guard.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Moon Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of silver. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume created by Kenta using Pheromone. Enables the user to tame hogs down at the Korean Folk Village.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire The Will of a Warrior.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Subani’s sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Use these Earrings if you want to make your Earrings transparent while still using all of the stats your Earrings possess.

string.name: desc
string.value: Once worn proudly by Masterian magicians, these shining earrings are infused with magical qualities.

string.name: desc
string.value: This unique item combines Power Crystal and Black Crystals for increased resistance to physical and magical forces.

string.name: desc
string.value: Flowing veil that brides wear on their Wedding Day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Flowing veil that brides wear on their Wedding Day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hand crafted Tiara that brides wear on their Wedding Day

string.name: desc
string.value: Flowing veil that brides wear on their Wedding Day.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you want to use the abilities available through hats, yet still want to show off your hairstyle, use this.

string.name: desc
string.value: While the character chats, the quote bubble is in gold. If combined with the Legendary Gold Poop Hat, the fly effect takes place.

string.name: desc
string.value: A restored headpiece of the Antellion Guard; extends the wearer's lifeforce and magical power.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ancient, revered symbol of insight. Awarded to those who achieved perfect union of mind, body and soul.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: When purchased, enter the name of the character you're being a couple with, then the item works for both. When the two are together, an effect comes out. Also, it can only be that of one male and one female character.

string.name: desc
string.value: After purchasing the ring, enter the name of the character that'll become your partner, so the other character will also receive the ring. Once the two characters equip themselves with the ring, stand next to each other to trigger the special effect. The couple-ring can only be worn by a couple that consists of two characters that are of opposite sex.

string.value: They are quiet and gentle in nature, so they don't go craving for food too often. They don't seem to be too obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little kitty, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: They are outgoing and active in nature, so they can't sit still for a period of time, which makes them hungry often. They are very obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little puppy, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little bunny, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very very active, so they get hungry pretty often. Very intelligent, they are quite obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Mini Kargo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.value: Active, yet calm at times. Can be moderately fed. Very smart in general.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Huskey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Very active and hungry at all times. Need to be fed often. Very friendly in nature, so it's easy to increase the level of closeness with it.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little black pig, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Calm, relaxed, and gentle. A very rare creature.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little panda, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A very adorable male baby dinosaur that is both active and unpredictable.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Dino Boy, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A very adorable female baby dinosaur that is both active and unpredictable.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Dino Girl, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: The always-curious monkey never rests, wanders around.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very gentle and obedient in nature, easily becoming friendly with the owner, which in turn speeds up the level-up process.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little white tiger, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Very outgoing and mature; doesn't need to be fed all the time. An intelligent pet that easily understands the commands from the master.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Elephant, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Every Christmas, Santa Claus rides on the sleigh driven by his trusty sidekick, Rudolph.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little red-nosed Rudolph, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: They are smart and obedient by nature, picking up commands faster than other pets, but they also can get hungry in a hurry.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Rudolph, but the "Water of Life" has completely dried up, turning it back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A hyper-active robot that always changes its mind on everything. Very unpredictable, yet easy to please.

string.name: descD

string.value: It was a cute little Huskey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet that quietly watches everyone's back. Quiet, but smart and gets a lot of things done.

string.name: descD

string.value: Somewhat active, quiet and not well-behaved in nature. It is not very obedient, but isn't hungry very often.

string.value: It was a cute little Turkey, but the "Water of Life" has completely dried up, turning it back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Penguins are always energetic and in good spirits. Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch on the Penguin to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.value: It was a cute little Penguin, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet who is equally quick-witted. Unlike its masculine appearance, it is prone to insecurity and shyness.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Jr. Balrog, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.value: This designed Golden Pig will definately bring you a Good Luck! Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.value: A special egg that becomes a mythical Baby Dragon upon hatching.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Baby Dragon hatched out of the special Dragon Egg. At Level 15, the pet can be evolved into a full-fledged Adult Dragon with the help of Garnox the NPC using the Rock of Evolution.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute baby dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Dragon into a Green Dragon!
